bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum, E2 tapered head tube, internal derailleur & dropper post routing, 31.6mm seat tube, 100mm threaded BB, low-direct front derailleur mount, 170mm Closed Convert dropouts

Race Face Ride w/Turbine outer ring, 36/22
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise
